title: 114_s2303
content: Exemption of national security agencies from sequestration. The Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 is amended to exempt national security agencies from budget reductions. This includes the Department of Defense, intelligence community, Department of State, FBI, Department of Homeland Security, and National Nuclear Security Administration.
